title: Crazy Yiuf
data:

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | None                                                                                                                                                                                  |

| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A withered old gnoll with a long silver beard, wielding a quarterstaff and wearing a cloak. He looks like a figure from mythology! Wait, is his beard held on to his ears with hooks?***“There was an Old Man with a beard, Who said, ‘It is just as I feared! Two Owls and a Hen, Four Larks and a Wren, Have all built their nests in my beard!’” -Edward Lear, \_A Book of Nonsense \[No. 1]\_. 1846. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 Trivia](#Trivia)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Crazy Yiuf the Enlightened** is a deranged [unique](/Unique "Unique") [gnoll](/Gnoll_\(monster\) "Gnoll (monster)") who shouts gibberish while murdering trespassers. He always generates wearing a [cloak](/Cloak "Cloak") and wielding a [chaos](/Chaos "Chaos")-[branded](/Brand "Brand") [quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"), which has the potential to be extremely dangerous. He may occasionally generate with a powerful [wand](/Wand "Wand") as well.

His vault is very distinct and recognizable: a stone chamber accessed through a characteristic uneven path, usually through [trees](/Tree "Tree") and occasionally blocked off by [fungi](/Fungus "Fungus"). His hut is guaranteed to contain at least one [hammer](/Hammer "Hammer"); sometimes, many hammers are scattered throughout its entrance. This vault is always blocked by a transparent [runed door](/Runed_door "Runed door").

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):2-7

## Tips & Tricks

- His chaos quarterstaff can be very dangerous - it may heal you, or it may electrocute you for enough damage to one-shot some low XL characters.

- Other than his quarterstaff, Crazy Yiuf is just a simple, 100% speed, melee monster with no resistances.

  - [Spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan") or [hasted](/Haste "Haste") players can just [kite](/Kite "Kite") him to death.
  - [Tukima's Dance](/Tukima%27s_Dance "Tukima's Dance") can disarm the quarterstaff, turning him into a relatively harmless opponent. A [wand of paralysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") or [wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") can also do the trick.
  - A reasonably strong character (160 HP or so) can survive a string of worst-case chaos effects and just kill him.

- Crazy Yiuf can wake up if you see him. So if you recognize his hut, you might want stay away until you're ready to fight him.
  - However, there can be [artefact](/Artefact "Artefact") hammers inside or outside the hut. If you never plan on fighting Crazy Yiuf, it's worth checking out.

- Note that you can be [teleported](/Teleport "Teleport") or [shafted](/Shaft#Exploration_Shafts "Shaft") inside Crazy Yiuf's hut.

## Trivia

If you are a follower of [Xom](/Xom "Xom") or you've inflicted [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") on Yiuf, his dialogue will become... interesting.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), the worst-case effects of the [chaos](/Chaos "Chaos") brand were more dangerous. You could be [banished](/Banish "Banish") or [paralysed](/Paralysed "Paralysed") for multiple turns, which made chaos attacks dangerous even to high level characters.
- Prior to [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), Crazy Yiuf's hut had maces instead of hammers.
- Prior to [0.23](/0.23 "0.23"), the door to Crazy Yiuf's hut was opaque.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Crazy Yiuf's hut had hammers instead of maces.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), you could find hammers as weapons outside Crazy Yiuf's hut.
html:
Crazy Yiuf

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Crazy Yiuf g 
HP 12-26
HD 3
XP 40
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 9
Will 10
Attack1 9 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type gnoll, gnoll
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Male
A withered old gnoll with a long silver beard, wielding a quarterstaff and wearing a cloak. He looks like a figure from mythology! Wait, is his beard held on to his ears with hooks?

“There was an Old Man with a beard,
Who said, ‘It is just as I feared!
Two Owls and a Hen,
Four Larks and a Wren,
Have all built their nests in my beard!’”
-Edward Lear, _A Book of Nonsense [No. 1]_. 1846.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 Trivia
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Crazy Yiuf the Enlightened is a deranged unique gnoll who shouts gibberish while murdering trespassers. He always generates wearing a cloak and wielding a chaos-branded quarterstaff, which has the potential to be extremely dangerous. He may occasionally generate with a powerful wand as well.

His vault is very distinct and recognizable: a stone chamber accessed through a characteristic uneven path, usually through trees and occasionally blocked off by fungi. His hut is guaranteed to contain at least one hammer; sometimes, many hammers are scattered throughout its entrance. This vault is always blocked by a transparent runed door.

Location

  • The Dungeon:2-7

Tips & Tricks

  • His chaos quarterstaff can be very dangerous - it may heal you, or it may electrocute you for enough damage to one-shot some low XL characters.
  • Other than his quarterstaff, Crazy Yiuf is just a simple, 100% speed, melee monster with no resistances.
    • Spriggans or hasted players can just kite him to death.
    • Tukima's Dance can disarm the quarterstaff, turning him into a relatively harmless opponent. A wand of paralysis or wand of polymorph can also do the trick.
    • A reasonably strong character (160 HP or so) can survive a string of worst-case chaos effects and just kill him.
  • Crazy Yiuf can wake up if you see him. So if you recognize his hut, you might want stay away until you're ready to fight him.
    • However, there can be artefact hammers inside or outside the hut. If you never plan on fighting Crazy Yiuf, it's worth checking out.
  • Note that you can be teleported or shafted inside Crazy Yiuf's hut.

Trivia

If you are a follower of Xom or you've inflicted confusion on Yiuf, his dialogue will become... interesting.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, the worst-case effects of the chaos brand were more dangerous. You could be banished or paralysed for multiple turns, which made chaos attacks dangerous even to high level characters.
  • Prior to 0.29, Crazy Yiuf's hut had maces instead of hammers.
  • Prior to 0.23, the door to Crazy Yiuf's hut was opaque.
  • Prior to 0.17, Crazy Yiuf's hut had hammers instead of maces.
  • Prior to 0.13, you could find hammers as weapons outside Crazy Yiuf's hut.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Crazy_Yiuf&oldid=80065"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Crazy Yiuf the Enlightened''' is a deranged [[unique]] [[Gnoll (monster)|gnoll]] who shouts gibberish while murdering trespassers. He always generates wearing a [[cloak]] and wielding a [[chaos]]-[[brand]]ed [[quarterstaff]], which has the potential to be extremely dangerous. He may occasionally generate with a powerful [[wand]] as well. 

His vault is very distinct and recognizable: a stone chamber accessed through a characteristic uneven path, usually through [[tree]]s and occasionally blocked off by [[fungus|fungi]]. His hut is guaranteed to contain at least one [[hammer]]; sometimes, many hammers are scattered throughout its entrance. This vault is always blocked by a transparent [[runed door]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:2-7

==Tips & Tricks==
*His chaos quarterstaff can be very dangerous - it may heal you, or it may electrocute you for enough damage to one-shot some low XL characters. 
*Other than his quarterstaff, Crazy Yiuf is just a simple, 100% speed, melee monster with no resistances.
**[[Spriggan]]s or [[haste]]d players can just [[kite]] him to death.
**[[Tukima's Dance]] can disarm the quarterstaff, turning him into a relatively harmless opponent. A [[wand of paralysis]] or [[wand of polymorph]] can also do the trick.
**A reasonably strong character (160 HP or so) can survive a string of worst-case chaos effects and just kill him.
*Crazy Yiuf can wake up if you see him. So if you recognize his hut, you might want stay away until you're ready to fight him.
**However, there can be [[artefact]] hammers inside or outside the hut. If you never plan on fighting Crazy Yiuf, it's worth checking out.
*Note that you can be [[teleport]]ed or [[shaft#Exploration_Shafts|shaft]]ed inside Crazy Yiuf's hut.

==Trivia==
If you are a follower of [[Xom]] or you've inflicted [[confusion]] on Yiuf, his dialogue will become... interesting.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], the worst-case effects of the [[chaos]] brand were more dangerous. You could be [[banish]]ed or [[paralysed]] for multiple turns, which made chaos attacks dangerous even to high level characters.
*Prior to [[0.29]], Crazy Yiuf's hut had maces instead of hammers.
*Prior to [[0.23]], the door to Crazy Yiuf's hut was opaque.
*Prior to [[0.17]], Crazy Yiuf's hut had hammers instead of maces.
*Prior to [[0.13]], you could find hammers as weapons outside Crazy Yiuf's hut.
